phrases.usage: Use this phrase to professionally introduce the specific issue you are experiencing with hotel facilities.
phrases.example: I'm having a problem with the heating system because the room remains quite cold despite the settings.

phrases.usage: Use this statement to describe a device or service that is currently non-functional so the staff can prioritize it.
phrases.example: It doesn't seem to work at all, so I cannot access my emails for the scheduled conference call.

phrases.text: Could you send someone to check it?
phrases.usage: This is a formal way to request a technical inspection or a maintenance visit to your room.
phrases.example: Could you send someone to check it soon because I am worried about the water leaking on the floor?

phrases.usage: Provide this information to ensure the staff can correctly identify your location within the hotel.
phrases.example: My room number is 412, so please instruct the technician to come to the fourth floor.

phrases.usage: Ask this question to manage your expectations regarding the duration of the repair or the arrival of help.
phrases.example: How long will it take for the repair to be completed, so I can plan my afternoon accordingly?

phrases.text: Just to confirm, they'll come at...
phrases.usage: Use this phrase to verify the exact time of the appointment and avoid any potential scheduling errors.
phrases.example: Just to confirm, they'll come at 4:00 PM because I need to leave for a business meeting shortly after.

phrases.usage: Conclude the conversation with this professional expression of gratitude to maintain a polite tone.
phrases.example: Thank you, I appreciate it because it is important that the lighting is fixed before this evening.

keyVocabulary.definition: The department responsible for repairing and preserving the hotel building and its equipment.
A failure to function normally or a specific technical fault in an appliance or system.
A useful feature or facility provided for the convenience of the guests, such as Wi-Fi or a mini-bar.
A skilled worker who is trained to repair specific technical equipment or systems.
A formal verb meaning to correct a situation or fix a problem that has been reported.
